Headlines: In Norway, Fighting the Culling of Reindeer With a Macabre Display
Snippets: A young indigenous Sami reindeer herder is suing the Norwegian government at the Supreme Court, with a little help from his sister — and her hundreds of bullet-ridden reindeer skulls.

Headlines: In Certifiably Happy Norway, a Cranky Traveler Finds Some Bliss (Within Reason)
Snippets: Charming villages. Inventive meals. A gorgeous glacier to hike. What’s not to like? (That rain was pretty loud.)

Headlines: ‘It Was a Blood Bath’: Freight Trains Kill 110 Reindeer in Norway
Snippets: Animal advocacy groups urge speed limits, new fencing and digital tracking to prevent more accidents.

Headlines: As Wild Salmon Decline, Norway Pressures Its Giant Fish Farms
Snippets: New rules to combat sea lice have angered Norway’s important aquaculture industry. But environmental groups want to go much further.

Headlines: Right-Wing Populist Is Blocked From Joining Nobel Peace Prize Committee
Snippets: The politician, Carl I. Hagen, opposes immigration and Islam, denies climate change and supports President Trump.

Headlines: In Norway, the Journey Is the Destination
Snippets: A writer finds emotional solace on some of Norway’s scenic remote roads, which have been transformed into architectural wonders.

Headlines: Norway’s Wealth Fund Considers Divesting From Oil Shares
Snippets: The move signals that the country, Europe’s top producer, does not have full confidence in oil’s future.

Headlines: In Norway, Arctic Herder Loses Case Over Reindeer Culling
Snippets: The herder, from the indigenous Sami community, had challenged a government order in a case that had drawn wide attention.

Headlines: Tasting the Sweetness of Summer, Berry by Berry
Snippets: Berries clothe seeds and fertilize them when they drop to the ground, and one summer they taught a young woman to savor time.

Headlines: Ruling Conservative-Led Bloc Wins Norway’s National Elections
Snippets: A race that was close in opinion polls, the election was viewed as a referendum on taxes, immigration, energy policy and European integration.
